full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I DKA' BA'I GNAD KUN GSAL BAR BYED PA'I MCHAN BU SHER PHYIN LAM GYI SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,(ZHES SHER PHYIN STONG PHRAG BRGYAD PA DANG MNGON RTOGS RGYAN SBYAR TE DON BDUN CU'I MCHAN BU BKOD PA 'DI NI SHER PHYIN GYI MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LCAGS MO PHAG GI LO CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I YAR TSES LA TSE MCHOG BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO MTHAR THUG 'DI NYID NAM YANG MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , DE LTAR BDAG CAG GI BLA MA NGES DON GYI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO DE NYID NAS BSTAN PA KHO NA THUGS LA BZHAG STE ^ RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I GZHUNG 'DI NYID LA DPYAD PA DU MA'I SGO NAS ZHUS DAG MDZAD CING, DON BDUN CU'I RKANG GRANGS RNAMS GZHUNG NYID DU BKA' MCHAN MDZAD 'DUG PA BZHIN THAR CHAGS SU PAR DU BSGRUB NA MCHAN BU BSKYAR NAS BRI MI DGOS PA'I 'JUG PA BDE BA YONG 'DUG KYANG, MDO 'DI KLOG 'DON DU MDZAD PA RNAMS LA DKYUS MCHAN GNYIS RES 'JOG BYA DGOS KYI GZIGS BDE MIN 'DUG PA BCAS, LJAGS ZHUS KYI BRGYAD STONG PA ZUR DU PAR BKOD GRUB PA LTAR DANG, BKA' MCHAN 'DI BZHIN RKYANG BA TZAM BKOD NA MCHAN BU GAR 'GRO'I SA MTSAMS RTOGS DKA' BAS, DE DAG LA PHAN KHYAD DON TSAN SO SO'I MTSAMS KYI SHOG GRANGS KHA GSAL BKOD YOD PAR MA ZAD, DON BDUN CU SO SO'I SA MTSAMS SU SPRUL SHAD RE DANG, NANG GSES KYI DON TSAN RNAMS LA SHAD RTAGS, 'DI 'DRA BA RE YOD PAS DE THOG TU MCHAN BU GNANG TSE LJAGS ZHUS MCHAN SBRAGS MA NYID DANG JI BZHIN MTHUN PAS DE LTAR DU MDZAD 'TSAL LO, ,)
